Package PoolGame

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
PoolGame.GameManager
public class GameManager extends Object
Controls the game interface; drawing objects, handling logic and collisions.

    • calculateCollision

      public static javafx.util.Pair<javafx.geometry.Point2D,javafx.geometry.Point2D> calculateCollision(javafx.geometry.Point2D positionA, javafx.geometry.Point2D velocityA, double massA, javafx.geometry.Point2D positionB, javafx.geometry.Point2D velocityB, double massB, boolean isCue)
      Collision function adapted from assignment, using physics algorithm: http://www.gamasutra.com/view/feature/3015/pool_hall_lessons_fast_accurate_.php?page=3
      Parameters:
      positionA - The coordinates of the centre of ball A
      velocityA - The delta x,y vector of ball A (how much it moves per tick)
      massA - The mass of ball A (for the moment this should always be the same as ball B)
      positionB - The coordinates of the centre of ball B
      velocityB - The delta x,y vector of ball B (how much it moves per tick)
      massB - The mass of ball B (for the moment this should always be the same as ball A)
      Returns:
      A Pair in which the first (key) Point2D is the new delta x,y vector for ball A, and the second (value) Point2D is the new delta x,y vector for ball B.
